Mary Kuksie Twala (14 Septemba 1939 4 Julaị 2020) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa. N'afọ 2011, a họpụtara ya maka Africa Movie Academy Award maka Best Actress in a Supporting Role.
Twala gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ mmepụta mpaghara South Africa
O nwere ọrụ ọbịa na oge mbụ nke Generations

N'afọ 2007, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri obodo, Ubizo: The Calling N'afọ 2010, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado na Hopeville, ihe nkiri ahụ ritere ọtụtụ onyinye n'ọtụtụ ememme na ememme onyinye. Twala mere "Ma Dolly" na ihe nkiri ahụ, nke mere ka ọ bụrụ onye na-akwado onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na 6th Africa Movie Academy Awards. Mgbe ọ gachara usoro ọgwụgwọ nke mere ka ọ ghara ime ihe nkiri ruo ọtụtụ ọnwa, Twala laghachiri na Vaya n'afọ 2015.

N'afọ 2016, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị otu na Comatose, ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara ndị isi na-eme ihe n'Afrịka gụnyere Bimbo Akintola na Hakeem Kae-Kazim. N'afọ 2017, ọ rụrụ ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri egwuregwu, Beyond the River Ka ọ na-erule ọnwa Ọktọba afọ 2017, a mara ọkwa na Twala ga-apụta na usoro ihe nkiri telivishọn ọhụrụ na Mzanzi Magic, The Imposter
A mụrụ Twala na 14 Septemba 1939 na Soweto Johannesburg
Ọ lụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Ndaba Mhlongo ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
Ha bụ nne na nna Somizi Mhlongo na Archie Mhlongo (nwụrụ n'afọ 1985).
Mary Twala nwụrụ na Julaị 4, 2020 n'ihe dịka elekere iri na otu nke ụtụtụ na ụlọ ọgwụ onwe onye Parklane, Johannesburg.
E liri ya na July 9, 2020 na Soweto
N'ihi iwu COVID-19, ọ bụ naanị ihe na-erughị mmadụ iri ise nwere ike ịga olili ozu ya.
